extendedInfo.description: The âÄeskÃ¡ poÅ¡taâ application offers smartphone users a fast and comfortable access to these services:Track&Trace, Find Post Office, Find Postcode, Change Instruction, Service Rating and Afternoon Delivery.Track&TraceThe âTrack&Traceâ feature enables you to track one or more consignments based on posting number (reference code). You can enter the code manually, by using barcode reader, or by automatically uploading it from incoming SMS messages. You can also name or archive consignments to find them more easily. The application supports push notifications that inform you about changes in the tracked consignmentsâ statuses.Find Post Office Do you want to know the location of the nearest post office, what services are available there and what are its opening hours? The application will automatically display the nearest post offices including their distance in km. You can further filter the post offices by e.g. offered services or opening hours. You can view the location of a selected post office on a map or get navigated to it. Now you can also use the âFavouritesâ menu to save your favourite post offices.Find PostcodeYou can use the âMunicipality or municipal districtâ, âName or part of streetâ or âHouse numberâ parameters to search for a postcode. The displayed result will include detailed information about the post office such as available services or opening hours.Change Instruction The âChange Instructionâ feature enables you to choose the right time for delivery of your consignment. For certain types of consignments, you can select e.g. afternoon delivery, next-day delivery, or depositing at another post office. This service is only available for Parcel Delivery To Hand or Parcel Delivery To Post Office consignments in limited time intervals.Service RatingThe âService Ratingâ feature enables you to assess how satisfied you are with ÄeskÃ¡ poÅ¡taâs services. The assessment always relates to the particular consignment, so you have to enter the consignment code into the text field. You can make your assessment as Recipient or Sender.Afternoon DeliveryÄeskÃ¡ poÅ¡ta meets your needs and offers you late delivery until 7 p.m. in certain locations and even until 8 p.m. in Prague. You can use this feature to check whether your address belongs to those locations which offer late delivery.

reviews.title: Nic moc
reviews.comment: Sice vypada hezky a instalace bez problemu, nicmene nepouzitelna - vyhledani zasilky nefunguje, na webu uz je napr 6 stavu, tato mobilni aplikace hlasi ze ji neumi najit vubec - zobrazeni mapy post taky nefunguje, sice me pekne zlokalizuje ale zadne posty v okoli nezobrazi na zadnou volbu pres menu, ani otevrene, ani sobotni nebo nedelni - nejde prepnout jazyk a bere natvrdo dle verze systemu - uninstall
reviews.author: Petr Streit

reviews.title: Translations...
reviews.comment: The basic functionalities of this app are ok (tracking, find a post office, etc.). But it would be absolutely great to translate the whole content of the app to English as well. It is quite disappointing to find Czech texts when the language of the app is set to English. I\'m sure that a lot of non-native Czech speakers would appreciate it.
reviews.author: Andreas Jeworutzki

reviews.title: Zklam\303\241n\303\255
reviews.comment: Aplikace by byla fajn, pokud by fungovala jak m\303\241. Bohu\305\276el z\303\241silky samy od sebe miz\303\255 ze seznamu a je pot\305\231eba je znovu na\304\215\303\255st. Co je hor\305\241\303\255 je spot\305\231eba baterie, aplikace je na prvn\303\255m m\303\255st\304\233 vyu\305\276it\303\255 baterie v syst\303\251mu a je to hodn\304\233 poznat, EVO spadlo za 24 hodin minim\303\241ln\303\255ho pou\305\276\303\255v\303\241n\303\255 o 40 procent (standardn\304\233 je to 10-15). Odinstalov\303\241no.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Vasek
reviews.comment: Skoda, ze nelze zvolit jazyk. Jak uz bylo psano nastavuje se podle systemu.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dobry start
reviews.comment: Akorat je to zatim nepouzitelne, kdyz na webu jsou akualnejsi informace (?!) a aplikace mi svevolne nahlasi ze zasilka je pripravena az sest dni po tom co sem ji vyzvedl
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nic moc
reviews.comment: Mapa se odkazuje na posledni lokaci, ktera je zrovna na Google Maps, s nemoznosti prepnout se na moji soucasnou lokaci. Toto je dost zasadni a bez teto funkcionality je aplikace ctvrtinova! Ocenil bych vyhledavac Postovnich schranek, ale kdyz vidim jak funguje vyhledavani Post na mape, tak si nedelam moc velke iluze, ze toho tato aplikace bude nekdy schopna.  Uprimne bych se docela divil, kdyby nase slavna zkostnatela instituce mela mapu schranek v elektronicke podobe. Mrzi me to, rad bych podporoval ceske podniky, ale to by se museli adaptovat na naroky 21. stoleti.
reviews.author: Michal Moll

reviews.title: high battery consumption
reviews.comment: eats your battery in the background
reviews.author: Jan Simon

reviews.title: Nic moc
reviews.comment: Jazyk je nastaven podle systemu a nejde prepnout. Balik nahodne mizi ze seznamu sledovanych. Nastaveni upozorneni je matouci, neni jasne (a nejde nastavit), pri jake zmene se bude upozorneni zobrazovat.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Neverim
reviews.comment: Chce podivne opravneni jako Reba cteni SMS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: pomal\303\251 a nefunk\304\215n\303\255
reviews.comment: aplikace pomalu reaguje, na webu po\305\241ty je aktu\303\241ln\304\233j\305\241\303\255 informace ne\305\276 v aplikaci a obnoven\303\255 nepom\305\257\305\276e, po kliknut\303\255 na telefonn\303\255 \304\215\303\255slo po\305\241ty na n\304\233co \304\215ek\303\241 a vyto\304\215\303\255 ho a\305\276 po cca p\304\233ti vte\305\231in\303\241ch.. Aplikace nic moc neum\303\255, p\305\231itom zab\303\255r\303\241 hromadu m\303\255sta, hlavn\304\233 \305\276e je  u ka\305\276d\303\251ho \305\231\303\241dku n\304\233jak\303\241 ta ikonka. Odinstalov\303\241no.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nefunguj\303\255 PS\304\214
reviews.comment: Nefunguj\303\255 PS\304\214, a\305\276 to bude fungovat, bude to mo\305\276n\303\241 slibn\303\241 aplikace. (Sam ACE)
reviews.author: A Google User
